resources.string: Sit back and relax. It usually takes 5â€“10 minutes for an order to be processed! Our representative will soon be accepting your order.
Your order has been accepted by our representatives. Relax, till we are preparing your order and assign you one of our delivery agents.
Your order have been prepared with love and now its on the way to you! Hold your cravings till our delivery agent knock on your door!
Your order has been delivered successfully! Hope you enjoyed your meal. And if you did, We would appreciate if you consider reviewing our service from the app.
